name: Ludum Dare 46: Goat Sacrifice
description:
My first game jam. 

Deliver a goat to the great ones living a the bottom of the ocean as a sacrifice to save humanity.

Click to move.

The stand alone build looks better than the web gl version.

bug fixes;
v1_1. Made fishes move the same speed regardless of framerate by adding time.deltatime to the temporary fish movement system I was 100% going to replace for a better one before I finished 👍

v1_2. Renamed the folder inside the zip to match the exe I renamed after building. Whoops! thanks Fazy
